prompt_base: muscular man, bald head, intense determined expression, three functional eyes clearly visible on forehead, green martial arts gi uniform, 8k cinematic photo, dynamic lighting
feature_prompt: defined muscular physique, sharp focus on the third eye structure, detailed realistic fabric weave on gi, slight skin imperfections, realistic proportions
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, smooth skin, perfect face, two eyes only, missing eye, blurry eyes, helmet hair, low quality, doll, sfw
